Name: ventilation components factory construction | ventilation components factory | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
Description: Building halls in steel construction for 70% of  the built up area and 10 m high multi-storey buildings for 30% of the built up area of 50000 m2 assumed. The life time of the tanks was assumed to be 50 years. The production machines have an assumed life time of 25 years. The yearly production is 5000 t/a. Land use derived from environmental reports of different similar companies.
